page.title: 06WHITEHURST
page.content:
WHITEHURST IS A GROUP OF COUNCIL HOUSES.IN 1980,6 HOUSES WERE KNOCKED DOWN BECAUSE THEY WERE SINKING. MRS JONES HAS LIVED THERE THE LONGEST. SHE HAS LIVED THERE 23 YEARS. THERE ARE 8 FAMILIES LIVING IN WHITEHURST NOW.ONE OF THE FAMILIES IS THE MATTHEWS FAMILY. THEY HAVE ONE SON CALLED JOHN WHO IS 8 YEARS OLD AND COMES TO PENTRE SCHOOL.ALTHOUGH THERE ARE NO OTHER BOYS IN WHITEHURST FOR JOHN TO PLAY WITH, HE LIKES LIVING THERE BECAUSE THERE IS PLENTY OF SPACE FOR HIM TO MAKE DENS AND RIDE HIS BIKE.
.
